title: And the Trees Crept In - Dawn Kurtagich [EN EPUB] [ebook] [p_s]
description:
And the Trees Crept In by Dawn Kurtagich
English | 2016 | Horror & Fantasy | 2.5 MB


A stunning, terrifying novel about a house the color of blood and the two sisters who are trapped there, by The Dead House author Dawn Kurtagich

The creaking of the house and the stillness of the woods surrounding them would be enough of a sign, but there are secrets tooâ€“the questions that Silla canâ€™t ignore: Who is the beautiful boy thatâ€™s appeared from the woods? Who is the man that her little sister sees, but no one else? And why does it seem that, ever since they arrived, the trees have been creeping closer?
Filled with just as many twists and turns as The Dead House, and with achingly beautiful, chilling language that delivers haunting scenes, AND THE TREES CREPT IN is the perfect follow-up novel for master horror writer Dawn Kurtagich.
